name: CliKintoneTest-103 Should return the error message when exporting records with --fields specified, including fields within a table.
fullName: features/record/export.feature#CliKintoneTest-103 Should return the error message when exporting records with --fields specified, including fields within a table.
statusMessage: The test doesn't have an implementation.

testStage.statusMessage: The test doesn't have an implementation.

steps.name: Given Load app ID of the app "app_for_export_table" as env var: "APP_ID"
steps.statusMessage: The step doesn't have an implementation.

steps.name: And Load app token of the app "app_for_export_table" with exact permissions "view" as env var: "API_TOKEN"
steps.statusMessage: The step doesn't have an implementation.

steps.name: When I run the command with args "record export --base-url $$TEST_KINTONE_BASE_URL --app $APP_ID --api-token $API_TOKEN --fields Text"
steps.statusMessage: The step doesn't have an implementation.

steps.name: Then I should get the exit code is non-zero
steps.statusMessage: The step doesn't have an implementation.

steps.name: And The output error message should match with the pattern: "Error: The field in a Table cannot be specified to the fields option \(\"Text\"\)"
steps.statusMessage: The step doesn't have an implementation.
